input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "JAXXON"
Reference Product Name: "14k Silver Cuban Link Chain - 8mm"
Reference Product Description:
Introducing our silver 8mm stainless steel Cuban Link Chain â€“ a statement of timeless elegance and enduring strength. Crafted with precision and exceptional resiliency, this chain is designed to withstand tarnishing, corrosion, and daily wear. Elevate your style with its bold 8mm gauge and classic Cuban link design, making it the perfect choice for any occasions.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm + 10mm Iced Out Cuban Gold Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 3mm Cuban Link Silver Chain'
  - Name='GLD Miami Cuban Link Necklace in 14K White Gold'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Cuban Silver Set'
  - Name='18K Diamond Cuban Chain'
  - Name='CRAFTD London Cuban Necklace and Bracelet Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm + 10mm Iced Out Cuban Gold Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm Cuban Link'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm Cuban Silver Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Cuban Link Silver Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON Iced Out Cuban Link Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm + 10mm Iced Out Cuban'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm Cuban Gold Set'
  - Name='JAXXON Iced Out Cuban Link Gold Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON Cuban + Rope Chain Stack'
  - Name='JAXXON Cuban Link Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Cuban Silver Chain Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm Women's Cuban Set'
  - Name='Craftd London Cuban Chain Bracelet'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 8mm + 10mm Iced Out Cuban Gold Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar Cuban link chain with 8mm gauge included, but has iced out (gem) embellishments and gold finish, differing from silver and plain design.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 8mm + 10mm Iced Out Cuban Gold Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar Cuban link chain with 8mm gauge included, but has iced out (gem) embellishments and gold finish, differing from silver and plain design.
A Cuban link silver chain from same brand, but thinner at 3mm vs 8mm; same style but different gauge and potentially different visual impact.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: GLD Miami Cuban Link Necklace in 14K White Gold
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same Cuban link chain style, similar metal type (precious white metal), but 14K white gold differs from stainless steel silver; still close in style and purpose.
JAXXON Cuban link chain with silver finish but 5mm size smaller than 8mm; same style but different gauge and possibly a set.
Cuban chain style with diamonds and 18K gold, more luxe and embellished; shares silhouette but differs in materials and embellishments.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CRAFTD London Cuban Necklace and Bracelet Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar Cuban link chain style and set format, but different brand and likely different material; relevance based on style and product type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 8mm + 10mm Iced Out Cuban Gold Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Repeated product; see prior explanation for same score.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 8mm + 10mm Iced Out Cuban Gold Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Repeated product; see prior explanation for same score.
Nearly identical product name and likely same product with 8mm Cuban link chain; matches reference product in brand, gauge, and style precisely.
8mm silver Cuban link chain in a set format by same brand; very close to reference product though as a set it may include additional items.
Same style and material but smaller 5mm gauge; similar purpose and construction but less bold impact than 8mm.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON Iced Out Cuban Link Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same chain style and brand but iced out (gemstone decoration) and no size specified; differs in embellishments and possibly size.
Includes 8mm chain with iced out style by same brand; similar gauge but with embellishment and mixed sizes.
Same 8mm chain size and Cuban link style by JAXXON but in gold finish; very similar except for metal color/material.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON Iced Out Cuban Link Gold Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar style and brand but iced out and gold, deviating from plain silver stainless steel; lower relevance due to embellishments and metal difference.
Includes Cuban link chain but combined with rope chain style; mixed product reduces focus on pure Cuban link chain relevance.
General Cuban link chain by same brand likely similar in style and construction; unclear size but closely related product type.
Same brand and silver Cuban chain style but larger 10mm gauge and set format; similar but physically different size.
8mm Cuban link chain set by same brand marketed for women; same size and style but set and gender focus differ slightly.
Cuban chain style bracelet (smaller accessory) by different brand; similar style but different product type and target usage.
